amendment.description: To provide for the observance of the week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1302 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1302 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S8500; text: CR S8500) To provide for the observance of the week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1302 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Coleman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1302 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
